MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry (DEXA) metrics of body composition (Hologic Inc., Waltham, MA)
MeasurementToolMetadata.Reference: Advanced Body Composition Reporting and Interpretation, A Technical Discussion. Thomas L. Kelly, Hologic, Inc.

session_id.Description: BIDS session ID indicating when data was collected

dxa_l_arm_lean_bmc_comb.Description: L Arm Lean And bone mineral content (BMC) Combined

dxa_l_arm_perc_fat_ptile.Description: L Arm Percent Fat aged matched percentile. Percentiles are based on NHANES data reported by Kelly et al. 2009 and only avaiable for children aged 8+
dxa_l_arm_perc_fat_ptile.Reference: Kelly TL, Wilson KE, Heymsfield SB (2009) Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry Body Composition Reference Values from NHANES. PLOS ONE 4(9): e7038.

dxa_r_arm_perc_fat_ptile.Description: R Arm Percent Fat aged matched percentile. Percentiles are based on NHANES data reported by Kelly et al. 2009 and only avaiable for children aged 8+
dxa_r_arm_perc_fat_ptile.Reference: Kelly TL, Wilson KE, Heymsfield SB (2009) Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry Body Composition Reference Values from NHANES. PLOS ONE 4(9): e7038.
